Erick Thohir: Apa Sofyan Basir Kembali Pimpin PLN? Tergantung TPA
04 Nov 2019, 08:06 by Dias Prasongko, Kodrat Setiawan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Badan Usaha Milik Negara (BUMN) Erick Thohir menanggapi kabar soal vonis bebas mantan Direktur Utama PT Perusahaan Listrik Negara (PLN) Sofyan Basir dalam kasus suap PLTU Riau-1. Erick mengatakan Kementerian, akan menghormati proses hukum tersebut.
"Kita semua menghormati proses hukum juga hasil dari setiap persidangan bahwa Pak Sofyan Basyir dibebaskan dari berbagai tuduhan," kata Erick dalam keterangan tertulisnya di Jakarta, Senin 4 November 2019.
Hari ini majelis hakim Pengadilan Tindak Pidana Korupsi Jakarta menyatakan bahwa Sofyan tidak terlibat dalam kasus tersebut.
Menurut Erick, dengan vonis bebas tersebut, nama Sofyan bisa terehabilitasi dengan sendirinya.
Kendati demikian, Erick mengatakan belum bisa memastikan apakah Sofyan akan kembali menjadi Direktur Utama PLN. Sebab, kembalinya Sofyan, ke PLN akan tergantung dengan keputusan Tim Penilai Akhir (TPA).
"Apakah Pak Sofyan akan kembali memimpin PLN, hal ini tergantung kepada keputusan TPA, karena Penentuan Direksi PLN harus melalui TPA," tutur Erick Thohir.

Erick Thohir: Is Sofyan Basir back to lead PLN? TPA dependent
04 Nov 2019, 08:06 by Dias Prasongko, Kodrat Setiawan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Minister of State-Owned Enterprises (BUMN) Erick Thohir responded to the news about the free verdict of former Director of PT Perusahaan Listrik Negara (PLN) Sofyan Basir in the bribery case of PLTU Riau-1. Erick said the Ministry would respect the legal process.
"We all respect the legal process as well as the results of each trial that Mr. Sofyan Basyir was acquitted of various charges," Erick said in his written statement in Jakarta, Monday 4 November 2019.
Today the panel of judges at the Jakarta Corruption Court stated that Sofyan was not involved in the case.
According to Erick, with the acquittal, Sofyan's name could be rehabilitated by itself.
Nevertheless, Erick said that he could not yet confirm whether Sofyan would return to be PLN's Managing Director. Because, the return of Sofyan, to PLN will depend on the decision of the Final Assessment Team (TPA).
"Whether Mr. Sofyan will return to lead PLN, this depends on the decision of the TPA, because the determination of the PLN Board of Directors must go through the TPA," said Erick Thohir.
